duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide veterinary care to animals including diagnosis, treatment, and preventive care.
Perform surgical procedures, vaccinations, and dental care for animals.
Educate and communicate with pet owners about animal health, nutrition, and care.
Maintain accurate patient records and documentation.
Collaborate with the veterinary team to ensure the highest standard of care for animals.

education_certification.credential: Doctor of Veterinary Medicine (DVM) degree from an accredited veterinary school.
